text: 4.2: 1 Ko 1.18; 2 Ko 2.17; 6.4; 6.7; 1 Te 2.3-5Nza mba gumgi zomzora mbui tɨvi mbatɨgi, nza kɨr nta segi. Nza guiguigi tɨvi zɨn vui fhu. Nza vhɨra Fhe Bakɨmen buna vhuueŋ, nza ne domdora sui fhu. Zakɨra fhuvara! Nza Fhe Bakɨme nɨman buni guarira nzuai. Mba gumgi gu mbigi nzan tɨvi ganɨv, Fhe Bakɨme khothɨgɨp, khaŋ suanga, mbe guigira Fhe Bakɨmen buni guarira nzuai.
